definition: next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time

sentences.english: Hypocrisy is also at play in how Bernanke and his Chinese counterparts are embroiled in a race to the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 伯南克與其中國對手的競次之爭不也是一種虛僞麼。

sentences.english: Followed by evaporation platform dolomite, the reservoir ability is general.
sentences.chinese: 蒸發臺地雲巖次之，儲集性能一般。

sentences.english: In three days, it was re-posted over 100,000 times.
sentences.chinese: 在三天內就累計發佈了10萬次之多。

sentences.english: The water condition of stony trough is worse than soil surface.
sentences.chinese: 石槽水分虧缺最嚴重，土面次之。

sentences.english: The modification effects of low-carbon ferrochromium and rare-earth ferrosilicon take second place.
sentences.chinese: 低碳鉻鐵和稀土硅鐵的變質效果次之。

sentences.english: Sunan yak are used mainly for transport and meat production, with milk and wool production taking the second place.
sentences.chinese: 肅南犛牛以馱運和產肉爲主，產奶和產毛次之。

sentences.english: Invalids bear food worst during summer and autumn, most easily in winter, and next in spring.
sentences.chinese: 夏秋兩季病人飲食最差，冬季最好，春季次之。

sentences.english: The content ofp hydroxybenzoic acid in sawdust is the highest, followed by that ofp coumaric acid.
sentences.chinese: 木屑中對羥基苯甲酸含量最高，香豆酸次之。

sentences.english: The types of flooding were river torrents and mountain torrents.
sentences.chinese: 水災類型以江洪災爲主，山洪爲次之。

sentences.english: Among the mineral deposits of the province, tin occupies first place; copper comes second.
sentences.chinese: 該省礦藏，以錫最多，銅次之。

sentences.english: Breast enlargement was the most popular operation for women, while liposuction was the next most popular.
sentences.chinese: 隆胸是婦女中最常見的手術，抽脂次之。

sentences.english: The effects of mancozeb were best and triadimefon inferior.
sentences.chinese: 其中以代森錳鋅防效最好，粉鏽寧次之。

sentences.english: This sandstone consists of quartz primarily and feldspar secondly.
sentences.chinese: 這種砂岩的成份以石英爲主，長石次之。

sentences.english: At a round table there's no dispute of place.
Hydrocarbons produced from Pinghu structural zone are mainly of condensate gas, and then to be followed by crude oil.
sentences.chinese: 平湖構造帶產出的油氣以凝析氣爲主，原油次之。

sentences.english: In using allusions, Liu Yong emphasized events rather than language.
sentences.chinese: 柳詞用典，以事典爲主，語典次之。

definition: second only to.../(in second place) preceded only by...
leading/in first place/top of the list
to regard as the foremost/to name as a prime example/to implement for the first time
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
to take possession of/to occupy/to take up
